name: Squash Them
description:
Squash the faces that stop smiling by tapping or clicking on them.

 Whether you’re the evil dictator that’s going to squash anybody that expresses their displeasure or whether you’re wanting to squash the evil thoughts and just keep the happy ones – the choice is yours – but the goal remains – squash them when they stop smiling – and do it quickly!

There are sound effects but no music.  By default the sound effects are on.  Depending on your browser settings you might not have sound or an alert that the sound is muted by the browser.
